definition[0]: a cupboard built into the wall of a room from the floor to the ceiling
example[0]: a closet full of beautiful clothes
definition[1]: to shut someone in a room away from other people in order to discuss something private, to be alone etc
example[1]: All morning he’d been closeted with various officials.
example[2]: Don’t let her closet herself away in her room.
explanation[0]: Closet is usually either passive or reflexive (=followed by myself/herself etc)
